item.title: BALL x PIT sales top one million, three free content updates set for 2026
item.content:encoded:
• PC

  • Switch 2

Aballs, new evolutions, new buildings, new characters, and more.

Total sales for “brick-breaking, ball-fusing, base-building survival roguelite” game BALL x PIT have surpassed one million units, publisher Devolver Digital and developer Kenny Sun announced. The companies also announced three free content updates planned for 2026.

BALL x PIT first launched for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, Switch, and PC via Steam and Microsoft Store on October 15, followed by Switch 2 on October 28. It is also available via Game Pass.

The three free content updates are as follows:

  • January 2026 – Raise your pinky for the “Regal” update.
  • April 2026 – Slink into the darkness for the “Shadow” update.
  • July 2026 – Get back to basics in July with the “Naturalist” update.

Each update will feature new balls, new evolutions, new buildings, new characters, and more.
